HeroSection.title: Logistics made easy and profitable
HeroSection.subtitle: Obsydian automates invoice auditing, detects errors and manages claims to maximize your logistics savings

ProjectsSection.title: How we make you save
ProjectsSection.paragraph: Obsydian is based on improving efficiency in logistics billing management.
ProjectsSection.case1Desc: Retail company recovers â‚¬45,000 annually by detecting fuel surcharges and incorrect rates in their domestic shipments.
ProjectsSection.case2Desc: Logistics company reduced audit time by 30% and increased error detection rate by 85% in international invoices.
ProjectsSection.case3Desc: Industrial manufacturer automated 100% of their claims and improved cost visibility in their supply chain.

ProductFeatureSection.title: Automate your audit
ProductFeatureSection.paragraph: Transform manual invoice management into an intelligent and automated process
ProductFeatureSection.feature1Desc: Receive, interpret and standardize invoices in any format. Our AI processes documents 24/7 without manual intervention.
ProductFeatureSection.feature2Desc: Identify surcharges, duplicates, incorrect rates and discrepancies by comparing with contracts and shipping data.
ProductFeatureSection.feature3Desc: Generate and send personalized claims to carriers with detailed reports of detected incidents.
ProductFeatureSection.feature4Desc: Monitor savings, recovery rate, audited invoices and key metrics from a centralized dashboard.
